meanings.definition: One of eight offspring born at one birth.
meanings.sent1: The zoo welcomed a rare octuplet of baby pandas.
meanings.sent2: The octuplet of ducklings followed their mother closely.
meanings.sent3: The octuplet of puppies caused chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The octuplet of flowers in the garden bloomed beautifully together.
meanings.sent5: The octuplet of kittens snuggled together for warmth.

meanings.definition: A group or set of eight similar things.
meanings.sent1: The octuplet of colorful balloons floated in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She received an octuplet of identical pens as a gift.
meanings.sent3: The octuplet of books on the shelf looked perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent4: The octuplet of trees in the park provided ample shade.
meanings.sent5: The octuplet of cupcakes on the tray looked delicious.
